snippet: Two women were strangers when news of their marriages appeared side by side in The New York Times. Decades later, their children are marrying each other.
lead_paragraph: Two women were strangers when news of their marriages appeared side by side in The New York Times. Decades later, their children are marrying each other.

headline.seo: Seeing an Omen on a Faded Newspaper Page
headline.main: Seeing an Omen on a Faded Newspaper Page
headline.print_headline: Seeing an Omen on a Faded Newspaper Page
